.single-post .download_button {
    background-color: #f7ad41;
    padding: 5px 15px;
    color: #fff !important;
    font-size: 16px;
    text-align: center;
    border: 1px solid white;
}

.author-kaaproject #theme-page{
	background-color: #605f5d;
}

.author-kaaproject{
	background-color: #605f5d;
}

.single-post .download_button:hover {
    background-color: white;
    border: 1px solid #f7ad41;
    color: #f7ad41 !important;
}

.video_single_post {
    max-width: 1000px;
}

#mk-header .header-logo a img {
    height: 54px;
    width: 90px;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1400px) {
    .single-post iframe {
        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 400px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1030px) {
    .single-post iframe {
        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 300px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
    .single-post iframe {
        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 200px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
    .single-post iframe {
        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 150px;
    }
}

	height: 30px;
}

        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 100%;
}

	padding-top: 0;
}

    margin-bottom: 20px;

}

    list-style-type: disc;
}

    padding-left: 20px;
    margin-left: 0px;
}

.terms-of-use ol li {
    list-style-type: decimal;
}

	font-size: 13px;
    padding: 2px 30px 2px 10px;

.page-id-8109 #menu-main_menu  .header-download-button a {
    background-color: #c2c2c2;

/* BB Banner */

.download-bb-banner {
    background-color: #e6e6e6;
    margin: 20px;
    padding: 20px 30px;
    text-align: center;
    overflow: auto;
}

.download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-headline {
    float: left;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 1.8;
}

.download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-button {
    float: right;
    width: 140px;
    margin: 0;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 20px;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
    .download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-headline,
    .download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-button {
        float: none;
    }
    
    .download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-button {
        margin: 10px auto 0;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
    .download-bb-banner {
       padding: 10px 10px;
    }
    
    .download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-headline {
        font-size: 20px;
    }
    
    .download-bb-banner .download-bb-banner-button {
        margin-top: 10px !important;
        padding: 5px 10px;
        font-size: 16px;
    }
}

.download-kaa {
    padding: 150px 0 50px !important;
    max-width: 1260px !important;

.download-section {
    position: relative;
    padding: 20px;
}

.hidden {
    display: none;
}

.dissabled{
    pointer-events: none;
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(1);
    filter: gray;
    filter: grayscale(1);
}

.deploy-button.dissabled {
    pointer-events: initial;
}

.bottom-tooltip {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -25px;
    padding: 5px;
    left: 50%;
    width: 80%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
    border-radius: 10px;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 16px;
    text-transform: none;
}

span.bottom-tooltip:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: -10px;
    left: calc(50% - 10px);
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-left: 10px solid transparent;
    border-right: 10px solid transparent;
    border-bottom: 10px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.download-form.dissabled:before,
.download-section.dissabled:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
    z-index: 20;
}

.loader {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    margin: -20px 0 0 -20px;
    filter: none;
    border: 10px solid #f7ad41;
    border-bottom-color: transparent;
    -webkit-border-radius: 50%;
    -moz-border-radius: 50%;
    -o-border-radius: 50%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    -webkit-animation: 1s rotate linear infinite;
    animation: 1s rotate linear infinite;
}
@-webkit-keyframes rotate {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
        transform: rotate(0deg);
    }

    100% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg);
        transform: rotate(359deg);
    }
}
@keyframes rotate {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
        transform: rotate(0deg);
    }

    100% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg);
        transform: rotate(359deg);
    }
}

.download-block .download-button {
    position: relative;
    float: right;
    width: 160px;
    padding: 10px;
    background: #f7ad41;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-align: center;
    color: #000;
    font-size: 21px;
    font-weight: 600;
    padding-left: 32px;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-transition: background, color .25s ease-in-out;
    -moz-transition: background, color .25s ease-in-out;
    -ms-transition: background, color .25s ease-in-out;
    -o-transition: background, color .25s ease-in-out;
    transition: background, color .25s ease-in-out;
}

.download-block .download-button:hover {
    background-color: #323232;
    color: #fff;
}

.download-block .download-button:hover .download-arrows:before,
.download-block .download-button:hover .download-arrows:after,
.download-block .download-button:hover .download-arrows span:before,
.download-block .download-button:hover .download-arrows span:after {
    background-color: #fff;
}

.download-block .download-button:hover .aws-deploy-cloud-stroke {
    stroke: #fff !important;
    -webkit-transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
    -moz-transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
    -ms-transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
    -o-transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
    transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
}

.download-block .deploy-button.dissabled:hover .aws-deploy-cloud-stroke{
    stroke: #000 !important;
}
    
.deploy-button.dissabled:hover {
    background-color: #b5b5b5;
    color: #000;
    cursor: default;
}

.download-block .deploy-button {
    padding-left: 25px;

}

.download-block #aws-deploy-cloud {
    position: absolute;
    top: 14px;
    left: 15px;
    width: 25px;
    height: 17px;
}

.download-arrows {
    position: absolute;
    -webkit-transform: scale(.45) translateY(-50%);
    transform: scale(.45) translateY(-50%);
    left: 20px;
    top: 22px;
}

.download-arrows:before,
.download-arrows:after,
.download-arrows span:before,
.download-arrows span:after
{
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 30px;
    height: 5px;
    background: #000;
    -webkit-transition: background .25s ease-in-out;
    -moz-transition: background .25s ease-in-out;
    -ms-transition: background .25s ease-in-out;
    -o-transition: background .25s ease-in-out;
    transition: background .25s ease-in-out
}

.download-arrows:before {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-13px);
    transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-13px);
}

.download-arrows:after {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg) translateX(13px);
    transform: rotate(-45deg) translateX(13px);
}

.download-arrows span:before {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg) translate(-3px, 12px);
    transform: rotate(45deg) translate(-3px, 12px);
}

.download-arrows span:after {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg) translate(1px, 12px);
    transform: rotate(-45deg) translate(1px, 12px);
}

.step {
    position: relative;
    height: 30px;
}

.step .round-bg {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    display: block;
    float: left;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    background: #f7ad41;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 10;
}

.step.success .round-bg {
    background: #3aa93a;
}

.step.success .round-bg:before,
.step.success .round-bg:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    border-top: 2px solid #fff;
}

.step.success .round-bg:before {
    top: 16px;
    left: 7px;
    width: 8px;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
    transform: rotate(45deg);
}

.step.success .round-bg:after {
    top: 14px;
    left: 11px;
    width: 15px;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg);
    transform: rotate(-45deg);
}

.step .dotted-border {
    position: absolute;
    display: block;
    top: 14px;
    width: 100%;
    border-top: 3px dotted #f7ad41;
}

.step.success .dotted-border {
    border-top: 3px dotted #3aa93a;
}

.step .dotted-border:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: -3px;
    height: 3px;
    width: 100%;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left,  rgba(30,87,153,0) 0%, rgba(170,192,216,0) 63%, rgba(253,253,253,1) 100%);
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left,  rgba(30,87,153,0) 0%,rgba(170,192,216,0) 63%,rgba(253,253,253,1) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right,  rgba(30,87,153,0) 0%,rgba(170,192,216,0) 63%,rgba(253,253,253,1) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#001e5799', endColorstr='#fdfdfd',GradientType=1 );
}

.tooltip::after {
    border-left: 16px solid transparent;
    border-right: 16px solid transparent;
    border-top: 16px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
    content: "";
    height: 0;
    margin-left: -16px;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -16px;
    left: 50%;
    width: 0;
}
.tooltip {
	background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin-left: -140px;
    opacity: 0;
    padding: 20px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 38px;
    left: 50%;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.15s linear;
    transition: all 0.15s linear;
    width: 280px;
	pointer-events: none;
}
.tooltip  p{
	color: #fff;
}

/* blog */
#dot-linee, #dot-linea, #dot-lineb, #dot-linec, #dot-lined{
  stroke-dasharray: 6;
  animation: dash 10s infinite;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
}

#dot-linez, #dot-linex, #dot-liney, #dot-lineu, #dot-linev, #dot-linew, #dot-linet{
  stroke-dasharray: 6;
  animation: revertdash 10s infinite;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
}

@keyframes revertdash {
  to {
    stroke-dashoffset: 200;
  }
}

@keyframes dash {
  to {
    stroke-dashoffset: -200;
  }
}

@-webkit-keyframes arrow-animated-unhover {
	0% {
		transform: translateY(10px);
		-webkit-transform: translateY(10px);
	}
    100% {
		transform: translateY(0px);
		-webkit-transform: translateY(0px);
	}
}

@keyframes arrow-animated-unhover {
    0%   {transform: translateY(10px);}
    100% {transform: translateY(0px);}
}


@-webkit-keyframes arrow-animated-download {
    0%   {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(0px);
		transform: translateY(0px);
	}
    25%  {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(10px);
		transform: translateY(10px);
	}
    50%  {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(5px);
		transform: translateY(5px);
	}
    100% {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(10px);
		transform: translateY(10px);
	}
}

@keyframes arrow-animated-download {
    0%   {transform: translateY(0px);}
    25%  {transform: translateY(10px);}
    50%  {transform: translateY(5px);}
    100% {transform: translateY(10px);}
}

@-webkit-keyframes arrow-animated-download-ami {
	0%   {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(0px);
		transform: translateY(0px);
	}
    50%  {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(25px);
		transform: translateY(25px);
	}
	100% {
		-webkit-transform: translateY(0px);
		transform: translateY(0px);
	}
}

@keyframes arrow-animated-download-ami {
	0%   {transform: translateY(0px);}
    50%  {transform: translateY(25px);}
	100% {transform: translateY(0px);}
}

.arrow-animated-download {
	-webkit-animation-name: arrow-animated-unhover;
	animation-name: arrow-animated-unhover;
    -webkit-animation-duration: 0.6s;
    animation-duration: 0.6s;
}

.formats_download:hover .arrow-animated-download {	
	-webkit-animation-name: arrow-animated-download;
	animation-name: arrow-animated-download;
    -webkit-animation-duration: 0.6s;
    animation-duration: 0.6s;
	-webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards;
	animation-fill-mode: forwards;
}

.formats_download:hover .arrow-animated-download-ami {
	-webkit-animation-name: arrow-animated-download-ami;
	animation-name: arrow-animated-download-ami;

/*modal page*/


/**
 * Material Modal CSS
 */

.modal {
    will-change: visibility, opacity;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -webkit-align-items: center;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -webkit-justify-content: center;
    -ms-flex-pack: center;
    justify-content: center;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    overflow-y: auto;
    overflow-x: hidden;
    z-index: 1000;
    visibility: hidden;
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    -webkit-transition-delay: $modal-delay;
    transition-delay: $modal-delay;
}

.modal--active {
    visibility: visible;
    opacity: 1;
}

.modal--align-top {
    -webkit-box-align: start;
    -webkit-align-items: flex-start;
    -ms-flex-align: start;
    align-items: flex-start;
}

.modal__bg {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
}

.modal__dialog {
    max-width: 600px;
    padding: 1.2rem;
}

.modal__content {
    will-change: transform, opacity;
    position: relative;
    padding: 2.4rem;
    background: #605f5d;
    background-clip: padding-box;
    box-shadow: 0 12px 15px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
}

.modal__content--active {
    opacity: 1;
}

.modal__close {
    z-index: 1100;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.modal__trigger {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    line-height: 1;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
}

.modal__trigger--active {
    z-index: 10;
}

#modal__temp {
    will-change: transform, opacity;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: #ffebee;
    -webkit-transform: none;
    -ms-transform: none;
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-transition: opacity 0.1s ease-out, -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: opacity 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
}

.demo-close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 1.2rem;
    padding: 0.6rem;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    border-radius: 50%;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
}

.demo-close svg {
    width: 24px;
    fill: #fff;
    pointer-events: none;
    vertical-align: top;
}

.demo-close:hover {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.logo {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 3vh;
    right: 3vw;
    z-index: 2;
}

.logo img {
    width: 45px;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0);
    -ms-transform: rotate(0);
    transform: rotate(0);
    -webkit-transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
}

.logo img:hover {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1.1);
    -ms-transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1.1);
    transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1.1);
}

/*drmfl recaptcha*/
.recap {
transform:scale(0.77) !important;
-webkit-transform:scale(0.77) !important;
transform-origin: 0 0 !important;
-webkit-transform-origin: 0 0 !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1300px) and (min-width: 1130px){
	.recap {
	transform:scale(0.67) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.67) !important;
	}
	.contact-us .wpcf7-form input{
		margin-top: 5px!important;
	}
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1130px) and (min-width: 980px) {
	.recap {
	transform:scale(0.57) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.57) !important;
	}
	.contact-us .wpcf7-form input{
		margin-top: 0!important;
	}
}
@media screen and (max-width: 980px) and (min-width: 800px) {
	.recap {
	margin-top: 10px;
	transform:scale(0.45) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.45) !important;
	}
}
@media screen and (max-width: 490px) and (min-width: 430px){
	.recap {
	transform:scale(0.67) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.67) !important;
	} 
	.contact-us .wpcf7-form input{
		margin-top: 5px!important;
	}
}

@media screen and (max-width: 430px) and (min-width: 0px){
	.recap {
	transform:scale(0.57) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.57) !important;
	}
	.contact-us .wpcf7-form input{
		margin-top: 0!important;
	}
}

@media screen and (max-width: 374px) and (min-width: 0){
	.recap {
	margin-top: 5px;
	transform:scale(0.45) !important;
	-webkit-transform:scale(0.45) !important;
	}
}

/*drmfl recaptcha end*/

.fa-caret-down.up-icon {
    -moz-transform: rotate(180deg);

    -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
    transform: rotate(180deg);
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out 0.3s;
}

.dropdown {
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none;
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    width: 48%;
    padding-right: 2%;
    float: left;
}
.dropdown br {
    display: none;
}
.dropdown a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.dropdown [data-toggle="dropdown"] {
    display: block;
    color: #f7ad41;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 20px;
}
.dropdown > .dropdown-menu li {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0px;
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 15px;
}
.dropdown > .dropdown-menu li:first-child {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.dropdown > .dropdown-menu li:before {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0px;
    top: 50%;
    content: '';
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px;
    margin-top: -3px;
    background: black;
}

}
.dropdown > .dropdown-menu li a {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    color: black;
    padding: 5px;
    padding-left: 20px;
}

@keyframes showAnimation {
    0% {
        -moz-transform: scaleY(0);
        -ms-transform: scaleY(0);
        -webkit-transform: scaleY(0);
        transform: scaleY(0);
    }
    100% {
        -moz-transform: scaleY(1);
        -ms-transform: scaleY(1);
        -webkit-transform: scaleY(1);
        transform: scaleY(1);
    }
}
@keyframes hideAnimation {
    0% {
        -moz-transform: scaleY(1);
        -ms-transform: scaleY(1);
        -webkit-transform: scaleY(1);
        transform: scaleY(1);
    }
    100% {
        -moz-transform: scaleY(0);
        -ms-transform: scaleY(0);
        -webkit-transform: scaleY(0);
        transform: scaleY(0);
    }
}

/*slider*/
.slider {
	position: relative;
	overflow: auto;
	/* width: 80%; */
	width: 92%;
	/* margin: 1em auto 3em; */
	margin: 1em auto 14%;
	z-index: 10;
}
.js .slider {
	overflow: hidden;
	/* z-index: -10; */
	/* background: radial-gradient(rgb(247, 173, 65), rgba(247,173,65,0.0)); */
}
.slider > ul {
	position: relative;
	list-style: none;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	font-size: 0;
	word-spacing: -.3em;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

.slider > ul > li {
	width: 100%;
	position: relative;
	display: inline-block;
	*display: inline;
	*zoom: 1;
	vertical-align: middle;
	font-size: 14px;
	word-spacing: 0;
	/* margin: 60px 0 120px; */
	/* margin: 80px 0 140px; */
	/* margin: 40px 0 120px; */
	margin: 40px 0 6vw;
	white-space: normal;
}

.slider > ul > .next:first-child {
	left: 100%;
}
.slider > ul > .prev.last-child {
	right: 100%;
}
.slider > ul > .target:first-child,
.slider > ul > .target.last-child {
	left: 0;
	right: 0;
}

.slider > ul > li > img {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
}

.slider .nav {
	z-index: 1;
	background: #fff;
	text-align: center;
	transition: opacity 2s;
	opacity: 0;
}
.slider.ready .nav {
	opacity: 1;
}
.slider .nav a {
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 1em .5em;
	padding: 0;
	border: none;
	width: 2em;
	line-height: 2em;

	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
	text-align: center;
	/* border-radius: 999px; */
	cursor: pointer;
	-webkit-transition: all .2s;
	transition: all .2s;
	width: 8px;
	height: 8px;
}
.slider .nav a:hover {
	background: #666;
}
.slider .nav a.active {
	background: #000;
}

/** border link **/
.pad-10{
	padding: 5px 10px;
	font-weight: bold;
	margin-bottom: 0;
	border-top: 3px solid #f7ad41;
}
.border-link-left{
	width: 3px;
    height: 47px;
    max-height: 0;
    background-color: #f7ad41;
    float: left;
    /* bottom: -57px; */
    bottom: 0px;
	/* margin-top: -3px; */
    /*margin-left: -3px;*/
    position: absolute;
}
.border-link-right{
	width: 3px;
    height: 47px;
	max-height: 0px;
    background-color: #f7ad41;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: 0px;
	position: absolute;
}
.border-link:hover .border-link-left, .border-link:hover .border-link-right{
	max-height: 47px;
    -webkit-transition: max-height ease-out .3s;
    transition: max-height ease-out .3s;
}
.border-link:hover .border-link-right, .border-link:hover .border-link-left{
	transition-delay: 0.3s;
}
.platdoc a:hover{
	color: #000;
}
.platf{
	position:relative;
}
.border-link{
	position: relative;
}
.platf:before, .platf:after{
	content: '';
    display: block;
    /* position: absolute; */
    background-color: #f7ad41;
    width: 30px;
    height: 3px;
    top: 100%;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1;
	margin: auto;
}
.platf:before{
	right: 0;
	width: 100%;
	background-color: #fafafa;
	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
}
.border-link:hover .platf:after{
	width: 100%;
    -webkit-transition: width ease-out .3s;
    transition: width ease-out .3s;
}
.border-link:hover .platf:before{
	width: 0px;
	-webkit-transition: width ease-out .3s;
    transition: width ease-out .3s;
}
.border-link:hover .platf:before{
	transition-delay: 0.6s;
}

/*map anim*/
.distribution-map{
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/map-only-compressor.svg);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 99%;
    background-position-y: 2px;
    background-position-x: 1px;
}
#dot .anim {
	  fill: #F15A29;
	  -webkit-animation:scaleanim 2s ease infinite;
	  -o-animation:scaleanim 2s ease infinite;
	  -ms-animation:scaleanim 2s ease infinite;
	  animation:scaleanim 2s ease infinite;
	  -webkit-transform-origin:70% 70%;
	  -moz-animation:none;
  }

@-webkit-keyframes scaleanim {
  	  0% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		30% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		40% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.2); }
		50% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		60% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		70% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.2); }
		80% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		100% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
	}

@keyframes scaleanim {
	  0% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		30% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		40% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.2); }
		50% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		60% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		70% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.2); }
		80% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
		100% { -webkit-transform: scale(1); }
	}
/*end map anim*/

/*animation*/
/* Bob */
@-webkit-keyframes hvr-bob {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }

  50% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px);
  }

  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }
}

@keyframes hvr-bob {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }

  50% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-4px);
    transform: translateY(-4px);
  }

  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }
}

@-webkit-keyframes hvr-bob-float {
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }
}

@keyframes hvr-bob-float {
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-8px);
    transform: translateY(-8px);
  }
}

/*.hvr-bob img{
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  -webkit-transform: translateZ(0);
  transform: translateZ(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}*/
.hvr-bob:hover img, .hvr-bob:focus img, .hvr-bob:active img{
  -webkit-animation-name: hvr-bob-float, hvr-bob;
  animation-name: hvr-bob-float, hvr-bob;
  -webkit-animation-duration: .3s, 1.5s;
  animation-duration: .3s, 1.5s;
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0s, .3s;
  animation-delay: 0s, .3s;
  -webkit-animation-timing-function: ease-out, ease-in-out;
  animation-timing-function: ease-out, ease-in-out;
  -webkit-animation-iteration-count: 1, infinite;
  animation-iteration-count: 1, infinite;
  -webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards;
  animation-fill-mode: forwards;
  -webkit-animation-direction: normal, alternate;
  animation-direction: normal, alternate;
}
/* Ripple Out */
@-webkit-keyframes hvr-ripple-out {
  100% {
    top: -12px;
    right: -12px;
    bottom: -12px;
    left: -12px;
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes hvr-ripple-out {
  100% {
    top: -12px;
    right: -12px;
    bottom: -12px;
    left: -12px;
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.hvr-ripple-out {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  -webkit-transform: translateZ(0);
  transform: translateZ(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  position: relative;
}
.hvr-ripple-out:before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  border: rgba(242, 245, 219, 0.8) solid 6px;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  -webkit-animation-duration: 1s;
  animation-duration: 1s;
}
.hvr-ripple-out:hover:before, .hvr-ripple-out:focus:before, .hvr-ripple-out:active:before {
  -webkit-animation-name: hvr-ripple-out;
  animation-name: hvr-ripple-out;
}
